quests.desc: Welcome to TextWorld! Retrieve the mop from the floor of the washroom.
commands: unlock formless passageway with formless latchkey
unlock formless passageway with formless latchkey

infos.name: studio
infos.desc:
You are in a studio. A normal kind of place.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an unblocked exit to the west.

infos.name: steam room
infos.desc:
Of every steam room you could have walked into, you had to show up in an ordinary one.

 You smell an intriguing smell, and follow it to a table. [if there is something on the s_0]On the table you make out [a list of things on the s_0]. You can't wait to tell the folks at home about this![end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage.[end if]

 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: canteen
infos.desc:
You arrive in a canteen. A standard one.

 You can see a chair. The chair is usual.[if there is something on the s_1] On the chair you can see [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

 There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading north. There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading west.

infos.name: closet
infos.desc:
You arrive in a closet. An usual kind of place.

 Look over there! a locker. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The locker contains [a list of things in the c_0]. There's something strange about this thing being here, but you don't have time to worry about that now.[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] Empty! What kind of nightmare TextWorld is this?[end if] You can see a counter. The counter is normal.[if there is something on the s_2] On the counter you can see [a list of things on the s_2].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] But the thing hasn't got anything on it. Aw, and here you were, all excited for there to be things on it![end if]

 There is [if d_3 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gateway leading east. There is an unblocked exit to the north. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: cookhouse
infos.desc:
You've entered a cookhouse. You can barely contain your excitement.

 You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a saucepan. [if there is something on the s_3]You see [a list of things on the s_3] on the saucepan.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3]But the thing is empty. Hm. Oh well[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] formless passageway leading west. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: shower
infos.desc:
You are in a shower. A normal kind of place.

 What's that over there? It looks like it's a board. [if there is something on the s_4]You see [a list of things on the s_4] on the board. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4]But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if]

 There is [if d_1 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] formless passageway leading east. There is [if d_2 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] passageway leading south.

infos.name: garage
infos.desc:
Welcome to the garage.



There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: restroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a restroom. A normal one. You begin to take stock of what's in the room.



You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You've moved into a standard room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be standard. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the washroom.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: basement
infos.desc:
You arrive in a basement. An ordinary kind of place.

 Hey, want to see a crate? Look over there, a crate.[if c_1 is open and there is something in the c_1] The crate contains [a list of things in the c_1].[end if][if c_1 is open and the c_1 contains nothing] What a letdown! The crate is empty![end if] You see a chest. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it.[if c_2 is open and there is something in the c_2] The chest contains [a list of things in the c_2].[end if][if c_2 is open and the c_2 contains nothing] The chest is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a rack. The rack is normal.[if there is something on the s_5] On the rack you make out [a list of things on the s_5].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_5] But the thing is empty.[end if] You can see a stand. [if there is something on the s_6]You see [a list of things on the s_6] on the stand.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_6]But there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bathroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a bathroom. A normal kind of place.

 You make out a bench. [if there is something on the s_7]On the bench you see [a list of things on the s_7].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_7]But the thing hasn't got anything on it. This always happens![end if]

 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading north. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: sauna
infos.desc:
You've entered a sauna.



You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: cookery
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a cookery. A standard one.



 There is [if d_0 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] portal leading south. There is an unguarded exit to the east.

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You are in a study. A standard one.

 You make out [if c_3 is locked]a locked[else if c_3 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] display.[if c_3 is open and there is something in the c_3] The display contains [a list of things in the c_3].[end if][if c_3 is open and the c_3 contains nothing] The display is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if] You make out a mantelpiece. The mantelpiece is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_8] On the mantelpiece you make out [a list of things on the s_8].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_8] The mantelpiece appears to be empty.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: workshop
infos.desc:
You arrive in a workshop. A standard one.

 You make out a portmanteau.[if c_4 is open and there is something in the c_4] The portmanteau contains [a list of things in the c_4]. Classic TextWorld.[end if][if c_4 is open and the c_4 contains nothing] The portmanteau is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You can make out a mantle. The mantle is ordinary.[if there is something on the s_9] On the mantle you can see [a list of things on the s_9].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_9] Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if]

There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unguarded.

infos.name: recreation zone
infos.desc:
Well I'll be, you are in the place we're calling the recreation zone.



There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You are in a chamber. A typical one.

 You make out [if c_5 is locked]a locked[else if c_5 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] box.[if c_5 is open and there is something in the c_5] The box contains [a list of things in the c_5].[end if][if c_5 is open and the c_5 contains nothing] The box is empty, what a horrible day![end if] You make out a desk. [if there is something on the s_10]On the desk you can make out [a list of things on the s_10].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_10]Unfortunately, there isn't a thing on it.[end if] You can see a recliner. [if there is something on the s_11]You see [a list of things on the s_11] on the recliner. Huh, weird.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_11]But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of junk.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west.

infos.name: playroom
infos.desc:
You arrive in a playroom. A normal kind of place. The room is well lit.

 Look out! It's a- oh, never mind, it's just a dresser.[if c_6 is open and there is something in the c_6] The dresser contains [a list of things in the c_6].[end if][if c_6 is open and the c_6 contains nothing] What a letdown! The dresser is empty![end if]

 There is [if d_4 is open]an open[otherwise]a closed[end if] gate leading south. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: bedchamber
infos.desc:
You are in a bedchamber. A typical kind of place.



There is an unguarded exit to the south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unblocked.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You have walked into a spare room. Not the spare room you'd expect. No, this is a spare room.

 You can make out [if c_7 is locked]a locked[else if c_7 is open]an opened[otherwise]a closed[end if] safe.[if c_7 is open and there is something in the c_7] The safe contains [a list of things in the c_7].[end if][if c_7 is open and the c_7 contains nothing] The safe is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.desc: it is what it is, a gate [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The passageway looks commanding. [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.name: gateway
infos.desc: it's a manageable gateway [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: portal
infos.desc: it's an imposing portal [if open]It is open.[else if closed]It is closed.[otherwise]It is locked.[end if]

infos.desc: The locker looks strong, and impossible to crack. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.desc: The formless latchkey is cold to the touch

infos.name: mop
infos.desc: The mop looks well matched to everything else here

walkthrough: unlock formless passageway with formless latchkey

objective: Hey, thanks for coming over to TextWorld! Please recover the mop from the floor of the washroom.
